seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Reach out for a calm, ICF-aligned exploratory chat. Share your context, understand our boundaries, and decide whether coaching is the right next step.

fallbackNotice: Temporarily showing English content while we complete this translation.

hero.title: If you’re not sure where to start, that’s okay.
intro: Share a few lines about what is changing. We respond with clarity and respect your pace.
You can share as much or as little as you like; we usually reply within three UK working days.
A low-pressure way to see if working together makes sense.

form.title: Send us a note
description: Short bullet points are enough. You stay in control of what you disclose.
We read every note and reply within three UK working days with a few options for the exploratory call.
form.responseNote: Replies land within two to three UK working days.

howFound.label: How did you find this site?

message.label: What would you like to talk about?
message.placeholder: Examples: relocating to the UK, returning to work after caregiving, cross-cultural leadership, feeling unsure about next steps.

consent.labelAfterLink: and consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching.
consent.helper: This confirms the coaching scope and how we handle your information.

form.successMessage: Thank you. We’ll reply within two to three UK working days.
form.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
form.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

directContact.title: Prefer email or phone?
body: Email or call if the form doesn’t work for you. We respond with the same care and keep conversations confidential.
Leave a voicemail or WhatsApp note for slower-paced replies.
directContact.note: Weekdays 09:00–17:00 UK time. Leave a voicemail or WhatsApp note if we miss you.
